questions.question: The entire energy or power produced by the engine is absorbed by the friction resistances of the brake in which of the following dynamometers does?
Which of the following dynamometer belongs to a different type.
Which of the following is not a characteristic of the Torsional dynamometer.

answers.d: Energy can be either utilized to do work or can be reused.

questions.question: What is the primary function of a rope brake dynamometer?

answers.b: To measure torque and power output

questions.question: In a rope brake dynamometer, the brake force is generated by:

answers.a: Friction between the rope and the drum
